name: Sniper Vs Sniper: Online Multiplayer
description:
** FAST-PACED ONLINE SNIPER MULTIPLAYER ACTION GAME **

Team up with the best snipers from all over the world and get ready for the best sniping
online multiplayer game

Enjoy the smooth and User Friendly controls and play the exciting cross-platform first person shooter against other players on mobile platforms.

UNIQUE GAME FEATURES :

** 6 well detail maps to have great sniping experience
** Join high speed servers from all over the world
** Ability to create private and public rooms
** Cross platform connectivity
** Unique features like kick player from room or make someone a host
** Live chat in lobby and in gameplay
** Simple and user friendly user interface
